title: Romania
summary:
Citi has been present in Romania since 1996 and provides high-quality financial products and services to local and multinational companies, small and medium-sized enterprises, the public sector and non-profit organizations.
After more than 11 years of successful operations in Romania, on January 1, 2009, Citibank Romania S.A. was converted into a branch of Citibank Europe plc (CEP) based in Ireland.
